title: Manjula Ruby Diamond Stud Earrings - Pushpala Vantillu
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Features a central cushion-cut Ruby surrounded by pave-set brilliant-cut Diamonds. Diamonds are of VVS clarity and F color. The gold is finished with a traditional Hyderabadi polish to enhance its luster.
features: The earrings feature a delicate floral (pushpala vantillu) design. The central Ruby is securely set in a bezel setting, providing both security and a clean, modern look. The surrounding diamonds are meticulously pave-set, maximizing their sparkle. These studs are handcrafted with an emphasis on lightweight comfort and enduring beauty.
colors: Predominantly gold and brilliant white diamonds
deep red Ruby at the center. A classic and timeless South Indian color palette.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. Equally suited for a casual gathering
or weddings as part of a larger jewelry set. Ideal for gifting for birthdays or anniversaries.
description: These earrings are a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique warmth and depth. The floral design adds a touch of femininity and elegance, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The contrasting ruby and diamond creates a focal point, making them the perfect eye-catching accent to any outfit.
